snippet: Ron Paul gives the sense that he is the leader of a movement more than of a political campaign, and he believes the consistency of his message will win over voters.
lead_paragraph: Ron Paul gives the sense that he is the leader of a movement more than of a political campaign, and he believes the consistency of his message will win over voters.

headline.main: ‘Ideas Do Have Consequences’: the Ron Paul Appeal
headline.print_headline: ‘Ideas Do Have Consequences’: the Ron Paul Appeal
